Soccer - Class in <Unnamed>
Soccer is a class that extend Game and implements the abstract methods This class will set up a game that replicates scoring in Soccer
Soccer(Team, Team) - Constructor for class Soccer
Soccer constructor will take in two teams and set the score array with each team will also set the periodName,numPeriods, and currentPeriods
